results.text: A Nu$al a Nerr, i illan degs, d akal ibuôen.
Ne$ t$ilev d At yifri kan, akked Öaqim, ay d lwehma, ger issekniyen nne£?
Mi ssôen iman nnsen ilmeéiyen deg ifri, nnan: "a Mass nne$! Efk ane$ d aêunu s$uôeK; Err a$ lameô nne$ d uûwib".
Deg ifri, Nesle$ imeééu$en nnsen, acêal iseggwasen.
Sinna, Nessker iten id, a Néeô anta, ger snat n trebbuyaâ, i iêesben acêal qqimen.
Nekwni, ad ak Neêku, s tidep, taqsiî nnsen. Nitni, ih, d ilmeéiyen, umnen s Mass nnsen. Nerna yasen nnhaya.
Nesseohed ulawen nnsen, mi kren nnan: "Mass nne$ d Mass n tmurt akked igenwan. Ur nepnuju, d awez$i, ar ôebbi, war Neppa, mulac a d nini awal dduni.
